Text:
Re: CWKO for 2012-02-17:

Because of other commitments, I missed the original, live airing of this program at 5PM my time, as well as the 8PM repeat. I was going to snarf the 11PM repeat, but according to http://current.com/schedule/ , the 02-17 program was / will be shown no more than two times (the two times I already missed).

So, until such time as my alternate source makes this program available, I will not be posting the 02-17 program. Don't hold your breath; that alternate source has not yet posted the 02-16 program, much less the 02-17 program.

Sorry, everyone. If I'd known in advance that Current was going to broadcast the 02-17 program only twice, I would have made more of an effort to capture it.
You apologize too much!  Without you, we'd have nothing!  Please, go have a life!  We (probably) won't die if we miss a couple nights of "Countdown" (even if there was a Thurber reading on 17.02...).
I am seeding the audio for the 2-17 program now - Sorry, I didn't keep the DVR'd video after I ripped the audio!

Uploads aren't working here right now.

For 2012-02-21 CWKO:
http://kat.ph/countdown-with-keith-olbermann-2012-02-21-h-264-aac-mp4-t6197278.html
